concept.title: Part II: DITA Maps
concept.shortdesc: This module introduces DITA maps and their role in organizing and linking topics for publication.

section.title: Learning Objectives
section.p: Upon completing this module, you will be able to:

ul.li: Define DITA maps and explain their primary function in organizing topics.
Describe how DITA maps enable hierarchical and conditional organization of content.
Understand the role of relationship tables in defining non-hierarchical links.
Explain how DITA maps influence navigation in various output formats.
